name: Muke Nuke
description:
In Development: current versio 1.0.

Muke Nuke is action retro-stylish shoot 'em up game, which is not anyhow inspired by Cannon Fodder. 

The game is military-themed and based on shooting action with one-soldier-based tactics. The player directs soldier through numerous missions* (*currently one level), battling enemy infantry, vehicles and installations** (**vehicles are not yet added to the game).

The player controls a one soldier. This soldiers is armed with machine gun and revolver, which kill enemy infantry almost with a single round. In addition to shooting action, the game features strategy elements and employs a point-and-click control system.

Current features:

  • One short level
  • One soldier

Features planned to add in future:

  • Several new levels
  • Vehicles such as Jeeps, tanks and helicopters as well as missile-armed turrets
  • Destroyable buildings

Muke Nuke includes pixel blood effects so it might not be appropriate for young players.
